p.d: A Nepalese New Year What happens when two different cultures meet? Bimala Hayoz and her daugher Barsha are organising a New Year party. The two Swiss, Patrick Rust, police instructor, and Stephan Meyer, social educator, are ready to help them organise the celebration. Will they be up to the challenge? Directed by: Susanne Heer, Christophe BÃ¼rge, Danielle Giuliani, (Switzerland, 2017)
